leaver_buster_punishment_body:
Due to recent leaving and AFK behaviors on this account, you will be placed in a lower priority queue for {{punishedGamesRemaining}} matchmade games.

If you’re experiencing connection issues, we've put together a troubleshooting guide called Lag Report that might help.
leaver_buster_onlockout_warning_body: Your leaver level has increased due to idling or leaving matches and a {{formattedQueueLockoutDuration}} queue lockout has been applied to your account in addition to queue delays. In order to reduce your level, you must play full matches without idling or leaving.
leaver_buster_prelockout_warning_body: Your leaver level is currently high due to idling or leaving behaviors in League. In order to reduce your level, you must play full matches without idling or leaving. If leaver behavior continues, queue lockouts will be applied to your account.
leaver_buster_warning_body:
Going AFK or abandoning a match (even if it’s unintentional) isn't cool. It wastes everyone's time, hurts your teammates, and you’ll face harsher penalties if it keeps happening. So, help us out: can you agree to not leave any further games?

If you’re experiencing connection issues, we've put together a troubleshooting guide called Lag Report that might help.
ranked_restriction_wins_required_body: Ranked Restrictions have been updated to require wins rather than only games played. To complete your existing restriction, you must now win {{punishedGamesRemaining}} games.
player_behavior_chat_restriction_game_no: Because of unsportsmanlike conduct, your in-game chat is being limited. Once you've completed the required number of games, the restriction will go away.
player_behavior_chat_restriction_time_no: Because of unsportsmanlike conduct, your in-game chat is being limited until {{endDate}}. Once the required time has passed, the restriction will go away.
player_behavior_code_of_conduct_header: In the league of legends community, I will:
player_behavior_code_of_conduct_item_bod: I will compete to win and will support my teammates. I understand that actions to undermine that effort are harmful to the game's integrity and my community.

I will respect my teammates and make every best effort to foster an environment where they can perform. I understand that respect builds trust, and that trust is needed for everyone to perform their best.

I will protect myself and others by making proper use of communication, reporting, and coordination systems. I will leverage these tools to help myself and my community be the best we can, in every game.
player_behavior_code_of_conduct_item_sub: Be my own last line of defense
player_behavior_code_of_conduct_item_bod: I will help Riot keep me safe. I will be responsible for my account, devices, personal information, and interactions with third parties.
player_behavior_code_of_conduct_link_mor: Visit here for more information about our Code of Conduct
player_behavior_code_of_conduct_early_ex: You cannot continue playing League of Legends without signing the player contract
player_behavior_forced_shutdown_ban_noti: Dear player, your access to League of Legends is temporary limited due to the previous negative behavior on this account. The total access limitation consists of 3 days suspension and 20 games with Chat Restrictions. Let us play positively and protect our game environment together.

Dear player, your access to League of Legends is temporary limited due to the previous negative behavior on this account. The total access limitation consists of 7 days suspension and 30 games with Chat Restrictions. Let us play positively and protect our game environment together.
This account has been suspended due to severe negative behavior. Contact Player Support for additional information.
This account has been permanently suspended due to severe negative behavior. Contact Player Support for additional information.
Your account has been suspended due to you abandoning your team. The client will now close.
You were penalized for unsportsmanlike conduct. The client will now close. Relog to find out more.
You were penalized for unsportsmanlike conduct. The client will now close. Relog to find out more.
You were penalized for intentional feeding. The client will now close. Relog to find out more.
This account has been suspended. Relog for more information.
player_behavior_login_ban_notification_b: Your access to League is temporary limited due to unsportsmanlike conduct. You're suspended for three days, and chat restricted for 20 games.
Your access to League is temporary limited due to unsportsmanlike conduct. You're suspended for seven days, and chat restricted for 30 games.
Your access to League is temporarily limited due to unsportsmanlike conduct. You're suspended for 14 days, and chat restricted for 40 games.
This account has been permanently suspended. Please check the email address associated with your League of Legends account for additional details.

This account has been locked to protect it from further suspicious activity. In order to secure the account it will remain unavailable for use until its creator submits a support request and provides the necessary details for recovery. Please click here if you’d like to submit an account recovery request.

You can also find more information on account security below:

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/articles/4402981557267

This account is unavailable due to a purchase dispute (known as a "chargeback"). This account will remain unavailable for use until the outstanding balance is repaid in full to Riot Games. If you would like to repay the outstanding balance and reactivate this account, please visit: https://re.pay.riotgames.com/

You can find more information on chargebacks here:

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/articles/4403733573011

Banned until {{endDate}}.

This account has been suspended due to MMR Boosting. As a result, it has received a 14-day suspension, lost all Honor levels, and will be ineligible for this season's rewards. If you need assistance, please submit a request here.

You can find more information on MMR/Elo Boosting here:

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/articles/201751834
Your account's been suspended until {{endDate}} because of abusive, player-reported comms.
Your account's been suspended until {{endDate}} because of abusive, player-reported comms.

Your account's been suspended until {{endDate}} for disruptive behavior in the game like trolling, griefing, intentionally feeding or deliberately trying to lose the match. The way out of the penalty box is to play to win without ruining the game consistently.

This League of Legends account has been permanently banned due to recurring MMR Boosting. If you need any assistance please click here. You can also find more information on MMR/Elo Boosting here:

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/articles/201751834

This account has been permanently banned for the use of prohibited third-party software. This kind of behavior causes severe damage to our community and League's competitive integrity, so this action will not be reversed.

You can find more information on third-party software here:

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/articles/225266848

This account has been permanently banned due to the use of inappropriate 3rd party software (known as "botting"). This kind of behavior causes severe damage to our community and this action will not be reversed. If you need assistance, please submit a request here.

You can find more information on 3rd party software/botting here:

https://support-leagueoflegends.riotgames.com/hc/articles/225266848
Because a player-triggered review found your in-game comms extremely inflammatory and offensive, your account's been permanently suspended.
Because a player-triggered review found your in-game comms extremely inflammatory and offensive, your account's been permanently suspended.
Your account has been permanently suspended for disruptive behavior in the game like trolling, griefing, intentionally feeding or deliberately trying to lose the match.

This account has been locked due to unusual activity or behavior. This account will remain unavailable until its creator contacts us directly through a support request. Please click here to submit a request.

This account has been locked due to suspicious or fraudulent activity. This account will remain unavailable for use until its creator submits a support request where we can investigate what happened. Once the investigation is done, the account can potentially become unlocked and playable again. Please click here to submit a request.

This account has been preemptively banned due to one of the following reasons: (1) continual attempts to circumvent preexisting suspensions, (2) the persistent use of 3rd party software on associated accounts, or (3) the enforcement of an ID ban. Actions like this are only taken in the most extreme cases in an effort to spare the league community from damaging individuals, and it is unlikely that this decision will be reversed.

If you need assistance, please submit a request here.
This account has been suspended until {{endDate}}. Please visit support.leagueoflegends.com for more information.
This account has been suspended permanently. Please visit support.leagueoflegends.com for more information.
player_behavior_reform_card_description_:
Because a player-triggered review found your in-game comms extremely inflammatory and offensive, your account's been permanently suspended.

You are among 0.006% of League players negative enough to be permanently banned.

Your account's been suspended until {{endDate}} because of abusive, player-reported comms. Your Honor level dropped and you lost access to free rewards. The way out of the penalty box is to consistently play to win without going aggro in chat. After serving your penalty and showing focus on staying cool, you'll get a notification unlocking your rewards again.

Your account's been suspended until {{endDate}} because of player-reported intentional feeding. Your Honor level dropped and you lost access to free rewards. The way out of the penalty box is to consistently play to win without ruining the game. After serving your penalty and showing focus on staying cool, you'll get a notification unlocking your rewards again.

Your account's been chat restricted because of player-reported chat logs. Your Honor level dropped and you lost access to free rewards. The way out of the penalty box is to consistently play to win without going aggro in chat. After serving your penalty and showing focus on staying cool, you'll get a notification unlocking your rewards again.

Your account's been chat restricted until {{endDate}} because of player-reported chat logs. Your Honor level dropped and you lost access to free rewards. The way out of the penalty box is to consistently play to win without going aggro in chat. After serving your penalty and showing focus on staying cool, you'll get a notification unlocking your rewards again.
player_behavior_reform_card_explanation_: Other players judged your comms to be far below the standards of the League community. The vast majority of players agree that while League’s an intense, competitive game, everyone deserves respect on the Rift.

Other players judged your comms to be far below the standards of the League community. The vast majority of players agree that while League’s an intense, competitive game, everyone deserves respect on the Rift. If this behavior continues, your account will be permanently suspended.

An overwhelming majority of players say intentionally feeding ruins games. Your deliberate choice to ruin League for others reflects a gross breach of community-defined standards.

You intentionally fed in these games:

Other players judged your comms to be far below the standards of the League of Legends community. The vast majority of players agree that while League’s an intense, competitive game, everyone deserves respect on the Rift. If you continue communicating this way, you’ll continue to be chat restricted and risk account suspensions.
player_behavior_reform_card_no_logs_text: We can't display chat logs for this punishment right now. Contact Player Support for more detailed info.
player_behavior_reporter_feedback_behavi:
Your recent report of an unsportsmanlike player was verified and a penalty was issued.

One penalty prevents most players from disrupting any more games. Thanks for the assist!
player_behavior_reporter_feedback_cheati:
We confirmed your report of another player cheating, and banned the player from League.

We’re constantly stepping up our efforts to combat scripting and other forms of cheating because we know it ruins your games. Thanks for the assist!
ranked_restriction_punished_games_incurr: Due to your recent penalty, you’ve been temporarily restricted from queuing up for any Ranked modes for {{punishedGamesRemaining}} games. You’ll lift this restriction by consistently playing to win without engaging in disruptive behavior. You can also check the status of your penalties on the {{profileImage}} profile tab.

Due to your recent penalty, you’ve been temporarily restricted from queuing up for any Ranked modes for {{punishedGamesRemaining}} games. You’ll lift this restriction by winning games without engaging in disruptive behavior. You can also check the status of your penalties on the {{profileImage}} profile tab.
remedy_received_notification_body_top_GA: We've issued a penalty to a player in your recent game for sabotaging the team. We're sorry you had a poor experience and would like to try and make it up to you:
We've issued a penalty to a player in your recent game for sabotaging the team. Your reports help improve our community, so keep up the good work!
We've issued a penalty to a player in your recent game for sabotaging the team. Reports by you and your teammates help improve our community, thank you!

credibility_behavior_warning_description: Your recent behavior is not in line with how other players communicate as you have been reported multiple times for Comms Abuse.
Please review our code of conduct and help us keep the League community safe by stay positive and not resort to engaging with disruptive behavior. Further reports may result in an account penalty.
behavior_warning_compete_option_descript: Teamwork wins games. I recognize that I can only win WITH teammates, not in spite of them.
behavior_warning_respect_option_descript: I understand that respect and empathy build trust, and trust is needed so everyone can perform their best.
behavior_warning_community_option_descri: I will build the community I want to play in, one match at a time. I will champion the needs of others, while striving to keep my games welcoming and fair for everyone.
behavior_warning_defense_option_title: BE MY OWN LAST LINE OF DEFENSE
behavior_warning_defense_option_descript: I will help Riot keep me safe. I will be responsible with my account, devices, personal information, and conduct.
